data.name: Bibou Quest
data.detailed_description:
Bibou's grandfather was kidnapped by the Cocus leader, now Bibou and his cousin Udi need to rescue their grandfather.
In this platform game the player needs to collect all the Yellow Stones from each stage.
Bibou and Udi must dodge the Explosive Blocks that Cocus throw,
in addition, the two protagonists can strike with electrical discharge the enemies.

In 2 player mode, you can play using only one controller, such as a keyboard or gamepad.
That's it, even if you don't have two controllers you can use just one for two players, isn't that cool?
Or if you prefer, use two controllers, the choice is yours.

In this game you, too, find:
More than 20 stages.
Automatic Save.
Automatic difficulty (adapts to the player).
Accessories to collect, such as shield, sword and magnet.

data.short_description: Lead this platform game in 2 players or 1 player, if you prefer, using only one controller if you don't have another. And go in search of rescuing Bibou and Udi's grandfather, who was kidnapped.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or above
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 165 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 165 MB available space
